ConVar/GetBool.description: Tries to convert the current string value of a

ConVar/GetDefault.description: Returns the default value of the

ConVar/GetHelpText.description: Returns the help text assigned to that convar.

ConVar/SetBool.description: Sets a ConVar's value to 1 or 0 based on the input boolean. This can only be ran on ConVars created from within Lua.

ConVar/SetFloat.description: Sets a ConVar's value to to the input number. This can only be ran on ConVars created from within Lua.

ConVar/SetInt.description: Sets a ConVar's value to the input number after converting it to an integer. This can only be ran on ConVars created from within Lua.

ConVar/SetString.description: Sets a ConVar's value to the input string. This can only be ran on ConVars created from within Lua.
